{"id":1195590447,"question_id":3221,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6 days, 5 hours","timestamp":1709718419,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1195590447/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Peaks","memory":"23.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> findPeaks(vector<int>& mountain) {\n        if(mountain.size() < 3) return {};\n        vector<int> ans;\n        for(int i = 0; i < mountain.size() - 2; i++){\n            if(mountain[i+1] > mountain[i] && mountain[i+1] > mountain[i+2])\n                ans.push_back(i + 1);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-peaks","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
